remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameters. |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowAbsolute`|`true` 绝对引用的形式返回行。`true` to return the row as an absolute reference. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`.| |`ColumnAbsolute`|`true` 若要为的绝对引用返回列。`true` to return the column as an absolute reference. 默认值为 `true`。The default value is `true`.| |`ColumnAbsolute`| 值之一。One of the values.| |`External`|`true` 若要返回的外部引用;`false`返回的本地引用。`true` to return an external reference; `false` to return a local reference. 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`.| |`RelativeTo`|A ，它定义的起始点。A that defines the starting point. 如果`RowAbsolute`和`ColumnAbsolute`是`false`，和`ReferenceStyle`是，必须包含一个起始点，相对的引用。If `RowAbsolute` and `ColumnAbsolute` are `false`, and `ReferenceStyle` is , you must include a starting point for the relative reference.| 如果你尝试使用而不指定任何参数，将获取对象，是 Visual Studio 基础结构的一部分和不应在代码中直接使用。If you attempt to use without specifying any parameters, will get a object that is part of the Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 如果引用包含多个单元格，`RowAbsolute`和`ColumnAbsolute`适用于所有行和列。If the reference contains more than one cell, `RowAbsolute` and `ColumnAbsolute` apply to all rows and columns. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，然后显示的地址以四种格式。The following code example creates a and then displays the address of the in four formats. 此版本用于文档级自定义。This version is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelNamedRange#42](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelNamedRange/CS/Trin_ExcelNamedRange.cs#42)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelNamedRange#42](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelNamedRange/VB/Sheet1.vb#42)] 此版本用于针对应用程序级外接程序。This version is for an application-level add-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameters. |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Start`|要返回的第一个字符。The first character to be returned. 如果此参数为 1 或被省略，则此属性将返回一系列字符开头的第一个字符。If this argument is either 1 or omitted, this property returns a range of characters starting with the first character.| |`Length`|要返回的字符数。The number of characters to be returned. 如果省略此参数，则此属性返回字符串的其余部分 (之后的所有内容`Start`字符)。If this argument is omitted, this property returns the remainder of the string (everything after the `Start` character).| 如果你尝试使用而不指定任何参数，将获取对象，是 Visual Studio 基础结构的一部分和不应在代码中直接使用。If you attempt to use without specifying any parameters, will get a object that is part of the Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 你可以使用到内的文本字符串的格式字符的对象。You can use the object to format characters within a text string. 对象不是一个集合。The object is not a collection. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建word Smith 并用其填充它。The following code example creates a and populates it with the word Smith. 然后将它通过使加粗，并将大小设置为 14 更改 word 中的第一个字符。It then changes the first character in the word by making it bold and setting the size to 14. 此版本用于文档级自定义。This version is for a document-level customization. remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果使用不带参数，此属性返回对象，其中包含指定范围中的所有列。When used without parameters, this property returns a object that contains all the columns in the named range. 此属性可以使用以下可选参数，用于指定范围中获取特定的列。This property can be used with the following optional parameters to get specific columns in the named range. 如果参数中使用此属性，返回值是必须强制转换为对象。If you use this property with parameters, the return value is an object that must be cast to a . |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowIndex`|若要获取的一个或多个列的索引。The index of one or more columns to get.

若要获取的单个列，请将以下对象之一传递给此参数：To get a single column, pass one of the following objects to this parameter:

的一个整数，指定你想要获取的列的索引。- An integer that specifies the index of the column you want to get. 列索引从 1 开始。The column indexes begin at 1.
的你想要获取的列的字母组成字符串。- A string that consists of the letter of the column you want to get.

若要获取多个连续列，请传递与格式字符串"`first column letter`:`last column letter`"。To get multiple contiguous columns, pass a string with the format "`first column letter`:`last column letter`". 例如，若要获取列 A 到 E，传递"A:E"。For example, to get columns A through E, pass "A:E". **注意：** 此参数的名称有误导性; 此参数指定你想要获取，不是行的列的索引。**Note:** The name of this parameter is misleading; this parameter specifies the indexes of the columns you want to get, not the rows.| |`ColumnIndex`|不使用此参数。Do not use this parameter. 此属性将引发如果你尝试将值传递给此参数。This property will throw a if you try to pass a value to this parameter.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，然后使用属性在范围的第一列中设置颜色、 名称、 大小和加粗的字体的所有单元格。The following code example creates a and then uses the property to set the color, name, size, and boldness of the font of all the cells in the first column of the range. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. 若要运行此代码，请将其复制到你的项目中的工作表类之一。To run this code, copy it into one of the worksheet classes in your project. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回`null`如果未找到匹配。This method returns `null` if no match is found. 选定内容或活动的单元格，则此方法不会影响。This method does not affect the selection or the active cell. 有关设置`LookIn`， `LookAt`， `SearchOrder`，和`MatchByte`保存每次使用此方法。The settings for `LookIn`, `LookAt`, `SearchOrder`, and `MatchByte` are saved each time you use this method. 如果您不指定这些参数的值在调用该方法的下一步时，将使用保存的值。If you do not specify values for these arguments the next time you call the method, the saved values are used. 设置这些参数将更改查找对话框中中的设置并更改查找对话框中的设置更改保存如果省略这些参数，则使用的值。Setting these arguments changes the settings in the Find dialog box, and changing the settings in the Find dialog box changes the saved values that are used if you omit the arguments. 若要避免出现问题，这些自变量显式设置每次使用此方法。To avoid problems, set these arguments explicitly each time you use this method. 你可以使用和方法重复搜索。You can use the and methods to repeat the search. 如果搜索到达搜索指定的搜索范围的末尾，它会绕到范围的开始处。When the search reaches the end of the specified search range, it wraps around to the beginning of the range. 若要停止搜索此头尾回绕发生时，保存的第一个找到的单元格的地址并随后测试此保存地址针对每个连续找到单元格地址。To stop a search when this wraparound occurs, save the address of the first found cell, and then test each successive found-cell address against this saved address. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法以查找具有值的第一个单元格`Seashell`中控件。The following code example uses the method to find the first cell with the value `Seashell` in a control. 然后该示例使用和方法查找具有值的下一步单元格`Seashell`，然后返回到原始的单元格。The example then uses the and methods to find the next cell with the value `Seashell` and then return to the original cell. 最后，该示例使用方法剪切具有值的第一个单元格的内容`Seashell`并将它粘贴到单元格 B1。Finally, the example uses the method to cut the contents of the first cell with the value `Seashell` and paste it into cell B1. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件包含一个常数，则此属性返回的常量。If the control contains a constant, this property returns the constant. 如果控件为空，则此属性返回一个空字符串。If the control is empty, this property returns an empty string. 如果控件包含一个公式，则此属性将显示在公式栏 （包括等号） 的格式相同以字符串形式返回该公式。If the control contains a formula, this property returns the formula as a string in the same format that would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign). 如果你设置的值或公式控制为日期，Microsoft Office Excel 将检查以查看是否使用日期或时间的数字格式之一已格式化该单元格。If you set the value or formula of a control to a date, Microsoft Office Excel checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats. 如果没有，Excel 更改为默认的短日期数字格式的数字格式。If not, Excel changes the number format to the default short date number format. 如果该范围是一维或二维范围，你可以设置为具有相同维数的数组的公式。If the range is a one-dimensional or two-dimensional range, you can set the formula to an array of the same dimensions. 同样，你可以将该公式放入数组中。Similarly, you can put the formula into an array. 设置多个单元格的公式控件将填充使用公式控件中的所有单元格。Setting the formula for a multiple-cell control fills all cells in the control with the formula. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性控件来对其求和的单元格 A1 到 A5，使用属性来隐藏公式，并随后将调用方法来对其求和的单元格和将其放在单元格中 A6。The following code example sets the property of a control to calculate the sum of cells A1 through A5, uses the property to hide the formula, and then calls the method to calculate the sum of the cells and place the sum in cell A6. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性上包含多个单元格的控件将导致异常引发。Using this property on a control that contains multiple cells will cause an exception to be thrown. 如果该单元格包含常量，此属性返回的就是，常量。If the cell contains a constant, this property returns that constant. 如果该单元格为空，则此属性返回一个空字符串。If the cell is empty, this property returns an empty string. 如果该单元格包含一个公式，此属性将返回为字符串，其中它将显示在公式栏 （包括等号） 的格式相同的公式。If the cell contains a formula, this property returns the formula as a string, in the same format in which it would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign). 如果你设置为日期单元格公式的值，Microsoft Office Excel 会检查以确定是否使用日期或时间的数字格式之一已格式化该单元格。If you set the value or formula of a cell to a date, Microsoft Office Excel checks to see whether that cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats. 否则，数字格式更改为默认的短日期数字格式。If not, the number format is changed to the default short date number format. 如果该范围是一维或二维范围，你可以设置为具有相同维数的数组的公式。If the range is a one-dimensional or two-dimensional range, you can set the formula to an array of the same dimensions. 同样，你可以将该公式放入数组中。Similarly, you can put the formula into an array. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，然后使用属性设置的值为相等的单元格 A1 和 A2 的值的总和。The following code example creates a and then uses the property to set the value of the to equal the sum of the values of cells A1 and A2. 该公式根据系统运行的语言进行了本地化。The formula is localized according to the language of the system it is run on. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameters. |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowIndex`|单元格的索引号你想要访问，请按从左到右的顺序。The index number of the cell you want to access, in order from left to right. `NamedRange.Item(1)` 返回范围; 左上角单元格`NamedRange.Item(2)`左上角单元格右侧立即返回该单元格。`NamedRange.Item(1)` returns the upper-left cell in the range; `NamedRange.Item(2)` returns the cell immediately to the right of the upper-left cell.| |`ColumnIndex`|数字或字符串，指示你想要访问，该单元格的列号开头 1 或"A"的范围中的第一列。A number or string that indicates the column number of the cell you want to access, starting with either 1 or "A" for the first column in the range.| 如果你尝试使用而不指定任何参数，将获取对象，是 Visual Studio 基础结构的一部分和不应在代码中直接使用。If you attempt to use without specifying any parameters, will get a object that is part of the Visual Studio infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. `RowIndex`和`ColumnIndex`自变量是相对偏移量。The `RowIndex` and `ColumnIndex` arguments are relative offsets. 换而言之，指定`RowIndex`1 的范围不工作表中的第一行的第一行中返回的单元格。In other words, specifying a `RowIndex` of 1 returns cells in the first row of the range, not the first row of the worksheet. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，然后使用属性以选择从偏移量的单元格由三个列和三个行。The following code example creates a and then uses the property to select the cell that is offset from the by three columns and three rows. 此版本用于文档级自定义。This version is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法不会更改选定内容或活动的单元格。Using this method does not change either the selection or the active cell. 有关设置`LookAt`， `SearchOrder`， `MatchCase`，和`MatchByte`保存每次使用此方法。The settings for `LookAt`, `SearchOrder`, `MatchCase`, and `MatchByte` are saved each time you use this method. 如果您不指定这些参数的值在调用该方法的下一步时，将使用保存的值。If you do not specify values for these arguments the next time you call the method, the saved values are used. 设置这些参数将更改中的设置**查找**对话框中，并更改中的设置**查找**对话框中更改如果省略这些参数，则使用的已保存的值。Setting these arguments changes the settings in the **Find** dialog box, and changing the settings in the **Find** dialog box changes the saved values that are used if you omit the arguments. 若要避免出现问题，这些自变量显式设置每次使用此方法。To avoid problems, set these arguments explicitly each time you use this method. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置中的单元格的值到字符串的控件"`This is a sentence.`"，然后使用方法将子字符串"`a`"与"`my`"。The following code example sets the value of the cells in a control to the string "`This is a sentence.`", and then uses the method to replace the substring "`a`" with "`my`". 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果使用不带参数，此属性返回对象，其中包含指定范围中的所有行。When used without parameters, this property returns a object that contains all the rows in the named range. 此属性可以使用以下可选参数，用于获取指定范围中的特定行。This property can be used with the following optional parameters to get specific rows in the named range. 如果参数中使用此属性，返回值是必须强制转换为对象。If you use this property with parameters, the return value is an object that must be cast to a . |参数Parameter|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`RowIndex`|若要获取的一个或多个行的索引。The index of one or more rows to get.

若要获取单个行，请传递一个整数，指定你想要获取的行的索引。To get a single row, pass an integer that specifies the index of the row you want to get. 从 1 开始的行索引。The row indexes begin at 1.

若要获取多个连续行，请传递与格式字符串"`first row`:`last row`"。To get multiple contiguous rows, pass a string with the format "`first row`:`last row`". 例如，若要获取行 1 至 5，可传递"1:5"。For example, to get rows 1 through 5, pass "1:5".| |`ColumnIndex`|不使用此参数。Do not use this parameter. 此属性将引发如果你尝试将值传递给此参数。This property will throw a if you try to pass a value to this parameter.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，然后使用属性在范围中的前五个行中设置颜色、 名称、 大小和加粗的字体的所有单元格。The following code example creates a and then uses the property to set the color, name, size, and boldness of the font of all the cells in the first five rows in the range. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. 若要运行此代码，请将其复制到你的项目中的工作表类之一。To run this code, copy it into one of the worksheet classes in your project. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelNamedRange#120](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelNamedRange/CS/Trin_ExcelNamedRange.cs#120)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelNamedRange#120](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelNamedRange/VB/Sheet1.vb#120)] 下面的代码示例创建，然后使用属性来确定有多少行处于的范围。The following code example creates a and then uses the property to determine how many rows there are in the range. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. 若要运行此代码，请将其复制到你的项目中的工作表类之一。To run this code, copy it into one of the worksheet classes in your project. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelNamedRange#47](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelNamedRange/CS/Trin_ExcelNamedRange.cs#47)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelNamedRange#47](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelNamedRange/VB/Sheet1.vb#47)]

summary.span: 获取和设置一个对象，该对象指示是否展开了 控件的大纲（以便列或行的详细信息可见）。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that indicates whether the outline is expanded for the control (so that the detail of the column or row is visible).

value.span: 如果展开指定范围的大纲（以便列或行的详细信息可见），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the outline is expanded for the specified range (so that the detail of the column or row is visible); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件必须包含单个摘要列或概述中的行。The control must contain a single summary column or row in an outline. 如果控件位于数据透视表中，此属性设置为`true`如果项显示详细信息。If the control is in a PivotTable report, this property is set to `true` if the item is showing detail. 如果控件不在数据透视表，以下语句为 true:If the control is not in a PivotTable report, the following statements are true: - 控件必须为单个摘要行或列中。The control must be in a single summary row or column. - 此属性返回`false`如果任何行或列的子级处于隐藏状态。This property returns `false` if any of the children of the row or column are hidden. - 此属性设置为`true`等效于显示的摘要行或列的所有子级。Setting this property to `true` is equivalent to showing all the children of the summary row or column. - 此属性设置为`false`等效于隐藏摘要行或列的所有子级。Setting this property to `false` is equivalent to hiding all the children of the summary row or column. - 如果控件位于数据透视表中，可以一次设置此属性对于多个单元格。If the control is in a PivotTable report, it is possible to set this property for more than one cell at a time. 可以返回此属性，仅当控件是单个单元格。This property can be returned only if the control is a single cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关设置`Header`， `Order1`， `Order2`， `Order3`， `OrderCustom`，和`Orientation`保存后，特定的工作表，每次使用此方法。The settings for `Header`, `Order1`, `Order2`, `Order3`, `OrderCustom`, and `Orientation` are saved, for the particular worksheet, each time you use this method. 如果您不指定这些参数的值在调用该方法的下一步时，将使用保存的值。If you do not specify values for these arguments the next time you call the method, the saved values are used. 这些自变量显式设置每次使用此方法，如果你选择不使用保存的值。Set these arguments explicitly each time you use this method, if you choose not to use the saved values. 通常排序不可转换为数值数据的文本字符串。Text strings that are not convertible to numeric data are sorted normally. 如果使用此方法定义没有自变量，Microsoft Office Excel 会进行排序以升序所选内容。If no arguments are defined with this method, Microsoft Office Excel will sort the selection in ascending order. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将整数的一组放在单元格 A1 A5 到，然后使用方法以将数据按升序排序。The following code example places a set of integers in cells A1 through A5 and then uses the method to sort the data in ascending order. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelNamedRange#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelNamedRange/CS/Trin_ExcelNamedRange.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelNamedRange#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelNamedRange/VB/Sheet1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用此方法定义没有自变量，Microsoft Office Excel 对进行排序以升序所选内容。If no arguments are defined with this method, Microsoft Office Excel sorts the selection in ascending order. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法进行排序使用拼音 （拼音中文字符的排序顺序）。The following code example uses the method to sort a using Pin Yin (phonetic Chinese sort order for characters). 若要对中文字符进行排序，此示例假定用户具有中文语言支持 Microsoft Office excel。To sort Chinese characters, this example assumes the user has Chinese language support for Microsoft Office Excel. Excel 将默认为排序通过如果用户不具有中文语言支持的值。Excel will default to sorting the by value if the user does not have Chinese language support. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示的文本的各种导入设置导入 Excel 的结果。The following table shows the results of importing text into Excel for various import settings. 数值结果将显示在最右侧的列。Numeric results are displayed in the rightmost column. |系统小数分隔符System decimal separator|系统千位分隔符System thousands separator|小数分隔符的值Decimal separator value|千位分隔符的值Thousands separator value|原始文本Original text|单元格值 （数据类型）Cell value (data type)| |------------------------------|--------------------------------|-----------------------------|-------------------------------|-------------------|------------------------------| |段Period|逗号Comma|逗号Comma|段Period|123.123,45123.123,45|123,123.45 （数值）123,123.45 (numeric)| |段Period|逗号Comma|逗号Comma|逗号Comma|123.123,45123.123,45|123.123,45 （文本）123.123,45 (text)| |逗号Comma|段Period|逗号Comma|段Period|123,123.45123,123.45|123,123.45 （数值）123,123.45 (numeric)| |段Period|逗号Comma|段Period|逗号Comma|123 123.45123 123.45|123 123.45 （文本）123 123.45 (text)| |段Period|逗号Comma|段Period|空格Space|123 123.45123 123.45|123,123.45 （数值）123,123.45 (numeric)| ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法将转换的用空格分隔日期字符串为三列。The following code example uses the method to convert a space-delimited date string in a to three columns. 此示例适用于文档级自定义。This example is for a document-level customization.
